description:
The community of Naples, Florida has recognized The Law Offices of Marc L. Shapiro, P.A., as one of Southwest Florida's (SWFL) premier firms in personal injury, foreclosure defense, and real estate law.

With over 27 years of experience, Marc L. Shapiro P.A. has served SWFL with integrity, passion, and a commitment to his clients. Have you been injured in a car accident? Trust the Law Offices of Marc L. Shapiro to represent you and your family. Marc L. Shapiro is a Personal Injury Attorney that cares about representing his community and clients with integrity.

A personal injury is devastating and can alter your life in more ways than one. Clients and their families are often confronted with aggressive defensive insurance firms and large corporations. We are prepared to take on these companies in court and hold them accountable for the negligent actions that contributed to your injury.

“WE ARE BIG ENOUGH TO HANDLE SERIOUS CASES & SMALL ENOUGH TO CARE”

Our law office has extensive experience in a wide range of personal injury topics, including automobile accidents, premises liability, defective products, dog bites and catastrophic injuries. We also strongly advocate for the rights of vulnerable nursing home residents in abuse or negligence cases.

The Law Offices of Marc L. Shapiro, P.A.was one of only eight law firms to be recognized with Southwest Florida's Lawyers of Distinction by Gulfshore Magazine (2006).Our knowledge and commitment to outstanding legal ethics has led to our firm being recognized as a Top 100 Trial Lawyers firm by The National Trial Lawyers.
